member.name: IBandSite.AddBand
member.summary: Adds a band to a band site object.
member.param: The interface of a band site object.
member.returns: Returns the band ID in ShortFromResult(hresult).

member.name: IBandSite.EnumBands
member.summary: Enumerates the bands in a band site.
member.param: Call the method with this parameter starting at 0 to begin enumerating. If this parameter is -1, thepdwBandID parameter is ignored and this method returns the count of the bands in the band site.
The address of a band ID variable that receives the band ID.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM-defined error code for errors. If the first parameter is -1, the count of the bands in the band site is returned.

member.name: IBandSite.GetBandObject
member.summary: Gets a specified band object from a band site.
member.param: The ID of the band object to get.
The IID of the object to obtain.
The address of a pointer variable that receives a pointer to the object requested.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM-defined error code otherwise.

member.name: IBandSite.GetBandSiteInfo
member.summary: Gets information about a band in the band site.
member.param: The address of a structure that contains the band site information for the object. ThedwMask member of this structure specifies what information is being requested.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM-defined error code otherwise.

member.name: IBandSite.QueryBand
member.summary: Gets information about a band in a band site.
member.param: The ID of the band object to query.
Address of an interface pointer that, when this method returns successfully, points to the IDeskBand object that represents the band. This value can be NULL.

Pointer to a DWORD value that, when this method returns successfully, receives the state of the band object. This state is a combination of BSSF_VISIBLE, BSSF_NOTITLE, and BSSF_UNDELETEABLE. See for more information on those flags. This value can be NULL if the state information is not needed.
Pointer to a buffer of cchName Unicode characters that, when this method returns successfully, receives the name of the band object.
The size of the pszName buffer, in characters.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IBandSite.RemoveBand
member.summary: Removes a band from the band site.
member.param: The ID of the band to remove.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM-defined error code otherwise.

member.name: IBandSite.SetBandSiteInfo
member.summary: Sets information about the band site.
member.param: The address of a structure that receives the band site information for the object. ThedwMask member of this structure specifies what information is being set.
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM-defined error code otherwise.

member.name: IBandSite.SetBandState
member.summary: Set the state of a band in the band site.
member.param: The ID of the band to set. If this parameter is -1, then set the state of all bands in the band site.
The mask of the states to set.
The state values to be set. These are combinations of BSSF_* flags. For more information, see .
member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful, or a COM-defined error code otherwise.
